trans_title: 经典车妙探 第一季
introduction: Hosted by renowned collector car archeologist, Wayne Carini, CHASING CLASSIC CARS welcomes viewers into the elite world of high-end car collection, as Wayne finds, buys, restores and sells some of the finest and most unique vehicles ever manufactured.In CHASING CLASSIC CARS, Wayne chases down original one-off cars in secret stashes around the country and meets with some of the...
chinese_title: 经典车妙探 第一季
